mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMARK VALUES ((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(#{bookmarkId}) + 1, 1) FROM BOOKMARK B where user_id = #{userId}), #{userId}, now(), #{productId})
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where product_id = #{productId} and user_Id = #{userId}
